overview:
• 10+ years of managing Brands, Marketing Communication and Online Marketing Activities
  • Has led Marketing Strategy, Online Marketing (SEM, Social Media, Digital collateral), Marketing Communication, PR, Sales Support, Product Marketing and Lead Generation efforts for technology companies and advertising agencies.
  • Planned and executed award-winning marketing campaign across channels - Print, Online, TV.
  • Built, mentored, led and guided high performance marketing teams.
  • Adept at coordinating overall marketing efforts, for both technology B2B and B2C companies.
  • Instrumental in directing digital marketing campaigns across email, CPA networks, banners and SEM, static and dynamic corporate websites, intranets, knowledge management systems and a Sales Force Automation software application.
